pages.title: Marsupial Lion
pages.text: Unlike the Thylacine, it is a member of the largely herbivorous Vombatiformes, related to the koala and wombat.

pages.title: Marsupial Lion
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:chicken$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
